name: api-call-action
description: GitHub Action to call an API endpoint with API key authentication

scripts.package: npm run build && ncc build src/main.ts -o dist --source-map --license licenses.txt
scripts.generate-test-data: playwright test --config sample-tests/playwright.config.all-passing.ts; playwright test --config sample-tests/playwright.config.with-failures.ts || true; mkdir -p src/__tests__/test-data/vitest && vitest run --config sample-tests/vitest.config.all-passing.ts; vitest run --config sample-tests/vitest.config.with-failures.ts || true
